Hui is an avid reader. She bought a copy of the best seller \textit{Math is Beautiful}. On the first day, she read $1/5$ of the pages plus $12$ more, and on the second day she read $1/4$ of the remaining pages plus $15$ more. On the third day she read $1/3$ of the remaining pages plus $18$ more. She then realizes she has $62$ pages left, which she finishes the next day. How many pages are in this book?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 120 \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ 180\qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 240\qquad\textbf{(D)}\ 300\qquad\textbf{(E)}\ 360 $
